content: The Skandha of Thought can be found in the Valley of Ecstasy in Mindfullness Cliff in The New West. From the Shrine, head along the cliff and jump down to the lower cave area beneath you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Skandha_of_Thought.md', within the main section titled 'Skandha of Thought'.
The content is as follows:
The Skandha of Thought can be found in the Valley of Ecstasy in Mindfullness Cliff in The New West. From the Shrine, head along the cliff and jump down to the lower cave area beneath you.
